==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|そう|しゅ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=そうしゅ}} compound {{m|zh|宗主|tr=tsowng tsyu<sup>X</sup>|lit=clan master, lineage chief}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|そうしゅ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|そうしゅ}}

# a [[suzerain]] {{qualifier|a kind of leader}}
# the [[head]] of a [[house]], [[lineage]], or [[clan]]
# a [[leader]] of a [[lineage]] in the ancient Chinese [[feudal system]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=そうしゅ|Buddhism|religion}} a [[funerary]] [[tablet]], especially one at [[w:Ise Grand Shrine|Ise Shrine]] for the imperial family

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|宗主権|そうしゅけん}}: [[suzerainty]], the [[power]] of a [[suzerain]]
* {{ja-r|宗主国|そうしゅこく}}: a [[suzerain]] [[state]], a country that holds [[dominion]] over and demands [[fealty]] from other countries
